mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SQ_RECRUIT ORDER BY SQ_RECRUIT_ID DESC

SELECT SQ_R.SQ_MEMBER_ID, SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_ID,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_TITLE,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_LOCATION,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_LATITUDE,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_LONGITUDE ,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_PART, SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_GENRE ,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_INPUT_DATE ,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_DATE ,SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_INFO ,SQ_M.SQ_MEMBER_NAME,SQ_M.SQ_MEMBER_EMAIL,SQ_A.SQ_ARTIST_PHONE,SQ_A.SQ_ARTIST_PHOTO FROM SQ_RECRUIT SQ_R, SQ_MEMBER SQ_M, SQ_ARTIST SQ_A WHERE SQ_R.SQ_RECRUIT_ID = #{id} AND SQ_R.SQ_MEMBER_ID = SQ_M.SQ_MEMBER_ID AND SQ_M.SQ_MEMBER_ID = SQ_A.SQ_MEMBER_ID
